## Source: ossf-package-analysis (465d533e4d5739006fe746ab80f7ca366926e9c7fa2a5d063a1a2c6a2b1cfb9c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@ftapi/components' @ 2.0.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
